attributes.title: Hate this app
attributes.review: This app was the worst once I opened the app I was welcomed by a fellow Cheeto and immediately got scared. Once I got the app working it kept on crashing and it wouldn’t work after anymore. I would say that I’m very disappointed with how bad this app is and I suggest to either update it or remove the app.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app took over a week to download and once I got it, it stole all the data and information on my phone. I’m rlly sad now Bc I can’t see any of the worthless crap bunker boy has to say😔 I also keep seeing the boogeyman in my sleep which I see Is a common occurrence after getting this app. Do NOT. Buy💓😸

attributes.title: DO NOT GET😔
attributes.review: I was excited to see what our amazing off brand leather president had in store for 2020 through this app! But right when I opened it my grandma dropped dead, every time I open the app another person I’m close to dies or commits murder!!! Do not get if u want a normal family that is alive or not on the run from the popo😭

attributes.title: Do not get this app! Gave me a virus!
attributes.review: As a person who is very committed to politics, this is by far the worst app I’ve ever encountered. Everything was horrible and I was very offended when the app told me to shut the f up! Then out of nowhere the app said it was gonna give me a virus! I was surprised at the immaturity that this app contained. Now all can say is vote trump out!

attributes.title: Just awful👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎😔
attributes.review: I was open to this app when I first downloaded it but what I saw was awful. This orange guy started to rap dance all over my screen. When I thought he was finished in cane out of my phone and started punching women and anyone of color. Not only that he left his spray tan all over all the walls of my house.

You dropped this 🔴 put it back on your nose 🤡✨🥰

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: this app is not at all what i expected... after 4 straight days of downloading (and my phone has PLENTY of storage) i finally open the app to find out it is horrible. it is really is disturbing and i think it released a demon into my room. i can’t believe how bad it is. i’m just really upset

attributes.title: This app literally gave me aids
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about or dead president and pay my respects but unbeknown editing was a really good idea to be a good idea to be able and then I wanna put your name down on your mind and I know that you’re gonna the morning you were always to me in conclusion I have aids now

attributes.title: Awful App
attributes.review: I wanted to know Trumps views and see what all the fuss was about, when I installed the app a laser shot out of my phone. This laser killed my cat! My poor baby died and I will sue Donald trump if need be to get my cat some justice. 😔 I also opened the app to Chester Cheetah wearing an awful toupee and he gained some weight. The image scared me so bad I went into cardiac arrest. 😔
